TITLE: In deeply Mormon Utah, a push to require clergy report abuse
SUMMARY: Survivors and faith leaders are demanding Utah change a law that exempts religious leaders from requirements that they report sexual abuse brought to their attention in spiritual confessions

TITLE: Today in History: August 20, deadly post office rampage
SUMMARY: Today in History

TITLE: Grand jury wants school board members removed over massacre
SUMMARY: A Florida grand jury empaneled after a deadly mass shooting at a Parkland high school has recommended that four members of that school board be fired

TITLE: Flood-damaged Death Valley to reopen popular sites to public
SUMMARY: Flood-damaged Death Valley to reopen popular sites to public

TITLE: Divided UN council fails to approve more top Taliban travel
SUMMARY: Divided UN council down to wire on Taliban travel exemptions

TITLE: Tanker truck in Yellowstone spills nearly 5K gallons of gas
SUMMARY: Tanker truck in Yellowstone spills nearly 5K gallons of gas

TITLE: 3rd attempted murder charge filed in shooting of Indiana cop
SUMMARY: Prosecutors have filed a third attempted murder charge against a man accused of shooting an eastern Indiana police officer in the head during a traffic stop and search for possible narcotics

TITLE: Washington state school shooter sentenced to 40 years
SUMMARY: A man who shot one classmate to death and wounded three others five years ago in a Washington state high school, apologized to his victims before he was sentenced to 40 years in prison

TITLE: Large fire consumes boats, vehicles at boatyard
SUMMARY: A large fire at a Massachusetts marina has destroyed several boats, buildings and vehicles

TITLE: Suit alleging off-camera jail beatings revived
SUMMARY: A federal appeals court has cleared the way for a lawsuit to proceed against guards and officials at a privately run north Louisiana jail where an inmate died with a fractured skull in 2015

TITLE: Mother is the 3rd person to die after Missouri home exploded
SUMMARY: Authorities say a young mother is the third member of her family to die in a gas explosion at her Missouri home

TITLE: Officials: 3 killed after planes collided in California
SUMMARY: Authorities say three people and a dog were killed after two small planes collided in Northern California while trying to land at a rural airport

TITLE: Walmart expands abortion coverage for employees
SUMMARY: Walmart, the nation’s largest employer, is expanding its abortion coverage for employees after staying largely mum on the issue following the Supreme Court ruling that scrapped a nationwide right to abortion

TITLE: Landlord gets $50K after deputies use Taser in false arrest
SUMMARY: A jury has awarded $50,000 to a northern Virginia landlord who was shot three times with a stun gun when sheriff’s deputies wrongly arrested him following a tenant's complaint

TITLE: 'Beatle' Elsheikh gets life term for deaths of US hostages
SUMMARY: A British man nicknamed one of the Beatles by his captives because of his English accent has been sentenced to life in prison for his role in the deaths of four U.S. hostages captured by the Islamic State

TITLE: See it? Squish it! Fighting the invasive spotted lanternfly
SUMMARY: The word is out in New York City and beyond

TITLE: California church shooting suspect pleads not guilty
SUMMARY: A Las Vegas man has pleaded not guilty in a California court to charges that he killed one person and wounded five in a shooting at a Taiwanese American church meeting

TITLE: Florida utility gets $500K fine, probation for fatal blast
SUMMARY: A Florida utility has been fined $500,000 and placed on three years’ probation for a 2017 deadly explosion at a coal-fired power plant that killed five workers

TITLE: Prosecutors: Alex Murdaugh stole from brother; family firm
SUMMARY: A disbarred South Carolina attorney charged with killing his wife and son has been indicted on another round of financial crimes

TITLE: Police: Pennsylvania man tried to buy stolen human remains
SUMMARY: A Pennsylvania man was charged with abuse of a corpse.

TITLE: Sheriff: 85 arrests in California-Florida drug flight scheme
SUMMARY: Investigators say 85 people have been arrested and millions of dollars in illicit drugs were seized in a smuggling operation that used commercial flights from California to Florida

TITLE: British national gets life in prison for Islamic State hostage-taking scheme that took about 2 dozen Westerners captive
SUMMARY: British national gets life in prison for Islamic State hostage-taking scheme that took about 2 dozen Westerners captive

TITLE: North Dakota school board reinstates Pledge of Allegiance
SUMMARY: The school board in North Dakota’s most populous city has reversed course on its decision to stop reciting the Pledge of Allegiance at its monthly meetings

TITLE: Robbery victim who fatally shot 7-year-old guilty of murder
SUMMARY: A man who opened fire after being robbed outside a mall has been convicted of murder in the fatal shooting of a 7-year-old girl

TITLE: Part of a foot, in a shoe, spotted in Yellowstone hot spring
SUMMARY: Yellowstone National Park officials are investigating after an employee spotted part of a foot, in a shoe, floating in a hot spring in the southern part of the park
